name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (doofusbruh_itchio)
description:
Double-click the flag.

Hello friends! it's a zombie tank shooter game by me. 

CAUTION! Jumpscare!

I fixed the loading glitch!! 

There are 1824 blocks in this game!

Story: Oh no! Zombies have access to tanks! You are the one that has to protect the survivors! Shoot zombies for cash to buy stuff.

TurboWarp link:

  https://turbowarp.org/684628951?interpolate&hqpen&stuck&clones=Infinity&limitles...

Use WASD to turn the barrel and the spacebar to shoot. 

Don"t let them touch you or you will die.

If you happen to die, it's GAME OVER!
